explicit

Class SCCConsumerBitSet

  • java.lang.Object
    • explicit.SCCConsumerBitSet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SCCConsumer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SCCConsumerBSCCs, SCCConsumerStore

    public abstract class SCCConsumerBitSet
extends java.lang.Object
implements SCCConsumer
    Abstract base class for a consumer of SCC information, for use with an SCCComputer, where each SCC is stored as a BitSet.
    When a new SCC is discovered, notifyNextSCC() will be called with a BitSet of the states in the SCC. When the SCC computation is finished, notifyDone() will be called once.
    By default, for each SCC a fresh BitSet is created. If the BitSets that are passed to notifyNextSCC can be reused for the next call, the reuseBitSet flag can be set in the constructor.
